General.Name: Acuvi AB
General.Description: Acuvi AB provides components and systems solutions for motion and positioning in Sweden and internationally. The company provides solutions in the field of life science instrumentation, semicon, medtech, and advanced industrial. Its products are primarily used in advanced microscopy and imaging, microfluids, semiconductor, manufacturing, and advanced optics. The company was formerly known as PiezoMotor Uppsala AB (publ) and changed its name to Acuvi AB in April 2022. Acuvi AB was incorporated in 1997 and is headquartered in Uppsala, Sweden.
